description: This Python source file implements a Confluence REST API client using the Atlassian platform with support for OAuth Bearer tokens. It contains a class with methods to search pages, list spaces, and create pages in Confluence, leveraging the httpx library for HTTP requests.

classes.name: ConfluenceClient
classes.description: A client for interacting with Confluence Cloud via REST API, supporting search, list spaces, and create page functionalities.

methods.name: __init__(self, access_token: str, cloud_id: str, base_url: str | None = None, timeout: float = 20.0)
methods.description: Initializes the ConfluenceClient with access token, cloud ID, optional base URL, and timeout.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] _headers(self)
methods.description: Constructs the HTTP headers for API requests, including the Authorization Bearer token.

methods.name: str _url(self, path: str)
methods.description: Generates the full URL for API endpoints based on the provided path.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] search_pages(self, query: str)
methods.description: Performs a search for pages matching the query string in Confluence.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] list_spaces(self)
methods.description: Lists all spaces available in Confluence.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] create_page(self, space_key: str, title: str, body: str)
methods.description: Creates a new Confluence page in specified space with given title and body content.

ctags.name: __init__
ctags.pattern: /^    def __init__(self, access_token: str, cloud_id: str, base_url: str | None = None, timeout: f/
ctags.signature: (self, access_token: str, cloud_id: str, base_url: str | None = None, timeout: float = 20.0)

ctags.name: create_page
ctags.pattern: /^    async def create_page(self, space_key: str, title: str, body: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:$/
ctags.signature: (self, space_key: str, title: str, body: str)

ctags.name: search_pages
ctags.pattern: /^    async def search_pages(self, query: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:$/
